definition: to tag sb with unfair label/power word
button

to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
hat/cap
old variant of 帽[mao4]
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: But labelling the Rightists is a different matter.
sentences.chinese: 只有扣帽子一事，对右派当别论。

sentences.english: This is another kind of labeling due to prejudices.
sentences.chinese: 这是基于偏见的另一种扣帽子方法。

sentences.english: The middle elements are sincere in their opposition to labelling.
sentences.chinese: 中间派反对扣帽子是真实的。

sentences.english: There are 3 "Dance Routines, " labeled Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced.
sentences.chinese: 有3个“舞蹈动作，”扣帽子初级，中级和高级。
